thread.title: Marist football takes on Campbell Saturday
thread.title_full: Marist football takes on Campbell Saturday

title: Marist football takes on Campbell Saturday
text:
Marist football takes on Campbell Saturday A.J. Martelli, Poughkeepsie Journal 6:09 p.m. EDT October 9, 2015 Marist 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
On Saturday, the Marist College football team will visit Campbell in Pioneer Football League action in Buies Creek, North Carolina. 
Marist (1-4, 0-2 PFL) enters the game having lost two straight while the Fighting Camels are coming off a win over Drake. However, history between the two teams has fallen in the Red Foxesâ€™ favor. Marist has won five of its six all-time meetings with Campbell, is currently on a three-game winning streak against the Fighting Camels and is 3-0 in road games against its Saturday opponent. 
Campbell is 3-2, 1-1. 
In each of its six games against Campbell, Marist has scored at least 21 points. In the five games they have won, the Red Foxes have scored at least 27 points. 
Despite a 30-27 loss to host San Diego in Week Five, quarterback Mike White passed for 237 yards and three touchdowns. Freshman Juston Christian proved to be one of his main targets, collecting 95 receiving yards and catching a touchdown pass. 
On defense, Michael Marston led Marist with a career-high 14 tackles in what was his first career start. Miguel Sandoval added pressure with a career-high 13 stops, one-and-a-half of which resulted in a loss of yardage. 
Campbell quarterback Kameron Bryant completed 11 passes against Drake in 23 attempts, and finished with 174 yards through the air and a touchdown. Jared Joyner rushed for 58 yards on 14 attempts, and scored one rushing touchdown. 
A.J. Martelli: amartelli@poughkeepsiejournal.com, 845-437-4836, Twitter: @AJM_PoJoSports 
Marist vs. Campbell 
Where : Barker-Lane Stadium, Buies Creek, North Carolina 
Radio/On the web : WBWZ (93.3 FM), www.goredfoxes.com, iHeart Radio 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://pojonews.co/1Lmx5yE TOP VIDEOS
